Class GroovyDocConfiguration

java.lang.Object
org.codehaus.gmavenplus.model.GroovyDocConfiguration
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GroovyDocConfiguration extends Object implements Serializable
Holds configuration for GroovyDoc generation.
Author:
Keegan Witt
